name: Sokotetris
description:
One piece to rule them all

One Mark to find them

One piece to bring them all

And in the game jam, bind them

Sokotetris is a game where you bring your own tetris pieces together, to form a line in the bottom to make them disappear. Go near a piece to attach it to yourself, or to other pieces that are already attached. Build the shape you need and put it where it needs to go.

Sounds simple, but you'll very quickly realize that it's a lot trickier than you first think.

CONTROLS
  • WASD/Arrow keys: move
  • Enter: Submit score
  • Mute music: CTRL+M
TOGAM 2021
  1. January: Purple Haiku // A game about feeling lost, while being relaxed about it
  2. February: Massacre: Tactics // A game about barbarians facing difficult decisions
  3. March: Astral Souls // A deckbuilder game where you build the ship by placing souls in synergized way to save the galaxy
  4. April: Don't Drown // A game about diving as deep as possible and coming back to tell the story
  5. May: Infight // A puzzle-shooter prototype about setting enemies against one another
  6. June: Sokotetris // A game about joining tetris pieces together
